data.message: Thank you so much Mr Mathers, it was a truly exceptional show, knew this was one I couldn't miss, and I thought the anger management tour was awesome, this was Epic! Please come back again anytime just don't be so long, truly yours your second biggest fan stan, I mean Ross, p.s don't worry if it all gets a bit too much for you tonight don't wanna spoil anything although it's already out there (eminem did a fantastic job of keeping everything hush hush tho, well done sir) but there are medical professionals on site ;) enjoy and if your parking in the car park take a lunch box we were in the main car park for over an hour an a half! Nevermind ;) worth every second, awesome show come back soon, and have a word with glastonbury you'd be amazing down there.
